pages.title: Kamen Rider Jam
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_jam)Sengoku Driver (Jam)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Sengoku Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Regeneration III$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength IV
